Articles.Content: So, I was on a thread (Kerbals Being More Petlike) and someone mentioned Kerbals dancing. Now I want ti see a mod that adds under the right-click menu for your kerbal "Dance" and it will make him do a random dance move until the character moves him. I know there have to be others who want a Kerbal dance party! Please, give life to Kerbal Dancing Time!

DSSP authored an unfinished (and since abandoned) plugin that allows independent manipulation of each joint in a Kerbal's skeleton, as well as rudimentary recording and playback capability. So yes, custom animations for Kerbals are definitely possible.
Hmm... Wonder if it'll work in .90. Will have to try it out and maybe learn something from it.
